metadata.dc:author: Coscarón Blanco, E
De Prado Sanjosé, M M
Pérez Liedo, M C
Suárez Ortega, M S
Blanco García, J L
González Sánchez, E
Zamora Martínez, T
metadata.dc:description: Lipomatous tumors represent an unfrequent cause for upper aerodigestive tract neoplasms, specially concerning the palatine tonsils, that should be included in their differential diagnosis. A case of palatine tonsil lipoma in a 11 year-old girl is reported and a revision of the available literature and some considerations about this condition are provided.
metadata.dc:title: Lipoma de amígdala palatina.
[Palatine tonsil lipoma].
